attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248729. **NEW FACELIFT MODEL**

**REAR PARK DISTANCE CONTROL**
**5 INCH INFOTAINMENT RADIO**
**BLUETOOTH**
**REVERSE CAMERA**
**LED DAY TIME RUNNING LIGHTS**
**HILL START ASSIST**
**CRUISE CONTROL

**SERVICE PLAN OF 5 YEARS OR 90 000KMS**
**WARRANTY OF 5 YEARS OR 200 000KMS**
**AA ROADSIDE ASSIST – 3 YEARS**

The Honda CR-V feels instantly familiar when you get behind the wheel, and it’s packed with features designed to make your life easier. Versatility, competency, and reliability are the tenets on which the CR-V is known for and it’s no stranger to luxury. The fluid lines of the CR-V were designed not only to create a sleek and dynamic look, but also to assist performance by channelling airflow, resulting in improved fuel economy.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. If you're seeking a compact SUV with impressive versatility, know that the 2022 Honda CR-V does just about everything well, the CR-V has become the world’s best-selling SUV. 
The two-row Honda provides an attractive and spacious cabin bolstered by bountiful storage solutions that are perfect for road trips.
Good to look at, good to drive, and good on petrol: the CR-V is among the most fuel-efficient compact crossovers. This vehicle is backed by a comprehensive 5 year/200 000 km warranty, as well as a 5 year/90 000 km service plan.

Finance Available to all Approved Buyers, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.
